name: The Forest of Artemis
description:
This is a text-based game where the player is stuck in the forest where Artemis and her nymphs reside. The player will meet some different characters as they complete their quest to help a mysterious bear.  Created using Twine, this is my final project for my Video Game Design Course. 

It is not quite yet finished but here is what I have so far. Thank you so much for playing!

 - Kylie <3
